column4: I used dd to make a copy of my Ubuntu 8.10 partition to another partition on the same HD.  How do i add the new partition to Grub.  I transferred from sda4 to sda3 if that helps
What do i need to enter
Have a look at the file, the HD(0,0) stuff is pointing to your partition. I cannot give you specifics, it's different for each OS and installation.
